Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp", "RightButtonUp")
local index = #PlayerTalentFrame.specTabs + 1
if IsDevClient() then self.TabIndex:SetText(index) end
PlayerTalentFrame.specTabs[index] = self

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(TALENT_ADDITIONAL_SPEC)
if #PlayerTalentFrame.specTabs == 1 then local unitLevel = UnitLevel("player")
local color = unitLevel < 40 and GRAY_FONT_COLOR or HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR GameTooltip:AddLine(TALENT_SPEC_TAB_AD_1, color.r, color.g, color.b, true)
if unitLevel < 40 then GameTooltip:AddLine(" ") GameTooltip:AddLine(TALENT_SPEC_TAB_AD_1_LEVEL_ERROR, RED_FONT_COLOR.r, RED_FONT_COLOR.g, RED_FONT_COLOR.b, true) end else GameTooltip:AddLine(TALENT_SPEC_TAB_AD_2, 1, 1, 1, true) end
GameTooltip:Show()

if self:GetParent().HeaderIcon.PointsSpentBgGold:IsShown() then self:GetParent().HeaderIcon.PointsSpentBgGoldHighlight:Show() else self:GetParent().HeaderIcon.PointsSpentBgSilverHighlight:Show() end
self:GetParent().HeaderIcon.PrimaryBorderHighlight:Show() self:GetParent().HeaderBorderHighlight:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(TALENT_HEADER_SUMMARY_TOOLTIP_HEADER) GameTooltip:AddLine(TALENT_HEADER_SUMMARY_TOOLTIP, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad:
if not self:GetParent().currencyButtons then self:GetParent().currencyButtons = {} end
self:GetParent().currencyButtons[self:GetID()] = self
if self:GetID() == 1 then self.Icon:SetTexture("Interface\\Icons\\inv_misc_crystalspec1") else self.Icon:SetTexture("Interface\\Icons\\Inv_misc_gem_amethystrough_03") end
self.epicColor = BAG_ITEM_QUALITY_COLORS[LE_ITEM_QUALITY_EPIC]

self.showRetrievingText = true self.Text:SetText(TALENT_LOADING_LABEL) self.Text:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) self.Dots:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(TALENT_SPEC_ACTIVATE, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)
if self:IsEnabled() == 1 then if C_Talent.GetSelectedTalentGroup() > 2 then local currencyInfo = C_Talent.GetCurrencyInfo(C_Talent.GetSelectedCurrency())
GameTooltip:AddLine(string.format(TALENTS_ACTIVE_BUTTON_DESC, BAG_ITEM_QUALITY_COLORS[LE_ITEM_QUALITY_EPIC]:WrapTextInColorCode("["..currencyInfo.name.."]")), NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b, 1) end else GameTooltip:AddLine(self.disabledReason, RED_FONT_COLOR.r, RED_FONT_COLOR.g, RED_FONT_COLOR.b, 1) end
local selectedCurrency = C_Talent.GetSelectedCurrency()
if selectedCurrency then local animationObject = _G["PlayerTalentFrameCurrencySelectFrameCurrency"..selectedCurrency]:GetCheckedTexture().animPulse AnimationStopAndPlay(animationObject, animationObject) end
GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnLeave:
local selectedCurrency = C_Talent.GetSelectedCurrency()
if selectedCurrency then _G["PlayerTalentFrameCurrencySelectFrameCurrency"..selectedCurrency]:GetCheckedTexture().animPulse:Stop() end
GameTooltip_Hide()
